content.original: BattleMech Mechanical Jump Boosters are intended to provide a simple, heat free jumping ability. Unlike Jump Jets, these Mechanical Jump Boosters are essentially giant hydraulic rams and myomer bundles that act as giant springs.
content.prevOriginal: BattleMech Mechanical Jump Boosters are intended to provide a simple, heat free jumping ability. Unlike Jump Jets, these Mechanical Jump Boosters are essentially giant hydraulic rams and myomer bundles that act as giant springs.
content.content: 战斗机甲机械跳跃助推器目的是为了提供简单、无热的跳跃能力.和普通跳跃推进器不同,这些机械式跳跃助推器本质上是巨大的液压油缸和充当巨大弹簧的人工肌肉束.

content.prevOriginal: BattleMech Mechanical Jump Boosters are intended to provide a simple, heat free jumping ability. Unlike Jump Jets, these Mechanical Jump Boosters are essentially giant hydraulic rams and myomer bundles that act as giant springs.
content.content: 战斗机甲机械跳跃助推器目的是为了提供简单、无热的跳跃能力.和普通跳跃推进器不同,这些机械式跳跃助推器本质上是巨大的液压油缸和充当巨大弹簧的人工肌肉束.

content.original: Increases damage dealt after jumping by 20% and boosts the distance this unit can travel when jumping by 20%.
content.prevOriginal: Increases damage dealt after jumping by 20% and boosts the distance this unit can travel when jumping by 20%.
content.content: 跳跃后造成伤害增加20%,跳跃距离增加20%

content.original: DFA attacks deal 10% less damage to the attacker.
content.prevOriginal: DFA attacks deal 10% less damage to the attacker.
